name: Widow Style
description:
This is a Style which brings out a morbid Widow aesthetic. Simply call Style-Widow in your prompt and your female characters will be ready for mourning, Victorian widow's weeds style! Maybe a little sexier than is appropriate sometimes...

If you'd like the effect to come through stronger (some models need it), try bumping up the emphasis on Style-Widow - or adding it into your prompt multiple times.

Please consider joining my Patreon! I have a comprehensive tutorial on how this, and my other popular TI embeddings are created! Happy to share my SD knowledge, through advanced tutorials. Also news, settings explanations, adult-art, from a female content creator (me!) patreon.com/theally
